data.title: November 2020 – HelvetArt
data.text:
November 2020

Thank you to all the artists who participate in our shows! Your talents and skills give us so much inspiration.

Artists from around the world were called to submit their work. The submissions came from different countries including: Austria, Australia, Canada, China, Check Republic, Croatia, Cyprus, France, Germany, Hungary, India, Italy, Kazakhstan, Kenia, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Russia, Serbia, Singapore, Spain, Switzerland, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States. A variety of styles and mediums were entered, including but not limited to acrylic, colored pencil, digital, ink, mixed media, oil, charcoal, pastel, photography, and watercolor. The judging criterion was originality, interpretation, quality, demonstration of ability, and usage of medium. Other factors, such as the quality of the images provided and their ability to be viewed online, also contributed to our decision. First Three Place Winners received money prizes in addition to their special recognition. Selected number of artists will receive a blog post about their work. Many of the artworks received will be shared and promoted on our Social Media pages.

Buyers – Please contact the artists directly for sales. HelvetArt Gallery does not handle any part of the sale or collect any commission, it is solely between the buyer and artist. You may find a link to the artist’s website or email address below their work.
